CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 2, 1954, pg. 9 reads: "Kolesques Donate To Belvedere - Miss Jeanne Holland and Mrs. Rebecca Armstrong (far right), president of the Kolesque Club, are shown as they presented Sister Petrie with a $100 donation check for Belverdere Hospital this week as proceeds from charity affairs given by the young women's group. Other members, not shown, are Janice Dent, Margaret Woods, Deniese McGuire, Delores Golden, Kathleen Douglass, Beatrice Harris, Geraldine Gilbert, Delores Anderson, Audrey McDaniels, Odell King, Joan Gainer, Germaine Moore, Joan Bruce and Adelaide McGranery. - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Jean Holland and Rebecca West Armstrong of the Kolesque Club handing check to Sister Petrie for Belverdere Hospital
